website_summaries.verdict: The easiest, mess-free way to store and travel with your yarn.
pros: Durable material and convenient strap make this bag easy to travel with
Spacious interior holds up to 10 skeins of yarn with added pockets for tools and accessories
Convenient top holes allow you to work with the yarn without removing it from the bag
cons: Yarn sits freely inside of the bag without dividers

customer_reviews.title: Great knitting tool!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a way to keep a large number of small balls of yarn available for knitting, while also keeping my yarn safe from my puppy's curious teeth. This bag does that very well. The slits on the top are perfect for knitting multiple colors at once (for stripes, for example.). The only way this could be better is if the pockets on the side had a flap to cover them and protect objects from falling out when carried, or if the pockets were large enough to fit a full-sized set of sewing shears securely.
customer_reviews.author: M. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy, Holes Well Reinforced
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that I purchased this to keep my yarns contained, yet untangled during my crochet projects. The holes are well reinforced, so the yarn does not easily slide between in the slit. It holds 4 super bulky skeins, 6oz each of yarn. The only complaint I have is that the over-the-shoulder strap was missing from my package. Else, it would have been five stars. I would recommend this to any crocheter or knitter to keep your yarns organized while working. UPDATE: I found the over the shoulder strap weeks later. i have updated my rating to five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: No shoulder strap
customer_reviews.text: Received this item missing the shoulder strap from the package. It has deep creases where it's been folded flat that cause the bottom to curve upward, so that it doesn't sit completely flat. It most certainly has a chemical smell. It's not the strongest plastic smell I've encountered, but it is noticeable and unpleasant. I could have overlooked the creasing and tried letting the smell dissipate, but the missing shoulder strap is maddening to me! This was likely a returned item that they just stuck right back onto a shelf. Very disappointed in this transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Kitchen Witch

customer_reviews.title: not great
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item because it had no vinyl/plastic as others do. However, it also does not have separation inside to keep you yarns from tangling, esp. if the skeins/balls have already been used some and have loose ends. Also, I thought it was rigid, but it collapses the same as other types, unless you totally stuff it with yarn. It is nice to have the yarn end feed through the hole in the top, but I got along with putting the ball/skein in a plastic bowl just as well. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: pattyb

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.text: I had this product in my cart for months debating whether or not it would meet my needs and be a more effective way of storing and transporting my knitting projects than what I was using at the time. I only wish I had ordered it sooner. It is light weight, collapsible when empty, roomy, sturdy, and just what I needed. I currently have four small projects, and three cases containing knitting and crochet tools, plus a few other odds and ends in the bag. It's convenient to store things at home, or to pick up and go if I want to take my projects with me. It was a worthwhile purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Grammi P

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I love this and might even buy one in the other color. I have a 2-year-old "kitten" who won't leave my yarn alone when I'm knitting. She can make a tangled mess before I can get to the end of the row. This bag makes it so that only what's coming out of the top is vulnerable, which is much easier to control. Update: Removing 3 stars because the zipper broke. I really liked it until that happened. No reason whatsoever. It just broke. So now it's to much better than just an open bag.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: A great bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is an exceptional bag for the on-the-go yarn artist. Keeps things really nice and organized, allows multiple projects to be stored and accessible at the same time. The only complaint (and its really a small one) that made me take off a star is the lack of any kind of closer on the pockets on the outside - a zipper or a flap of some kind covering the openings would have made this perfect, as we have cats that like to knock things over and onto the floor, which causes things to fall out of the pockets. For the price, can't find anything better!
customer_reviews.author: Diashto

customer_reviews.title: Awesome knitting bag - exactly what my wife wanted
customer_reviews.text: So the best thing here is that now my wife's knitting hobby is cat-proofed. I believe the bag lets you work with 4 different strands of yarn at once, and it has a zillion pockets for all the knitting needles and other accessories. Great to have all the yarn in a bag, seems to make the knitting easier and faster, not having to chase skeens of yarn all over the damn place. Looks well constructed with good zippers that function as they should. This is one of those "It just works" items.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: GOOD BAG BUT NEEDS MORE STRUCTURE
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy bag and works well for my crocheting. It easily holds all the yarn and accessories needed for a project. However, I've given it 4 stars instead of 5 because for me there's one negative. If the bag isn't completely full, the sides tend to collapse making it difficult to pull the yarn while crocheting or knitting. In my opinion, it would have been better if the sides had been reinforced in some way to make them hold their shape whether the bag is full or not. Maybe a future design will address this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Gibson Girl

customer_reviews.title: Overall a nice yarn bag
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY like the fabric. The smell not so much. Am hoping it will air out over time. Wish it was a tad bigger and offered an inside zipped pocket with additional smaller zippered pouches for all the accessories knitting and crochet require. The blue is not nearly as vibrant as the photo indicates. I have a pretty good feel for the accuracy of my laptop in this regard, as other products have been spot on in their color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item, sturdy and convenient.
customer_reviews.text: Really well made, sturdy construction. Even after collapsing it (crushing it) while packing in the car, it came right back up to its standing position. It has a good set of two deep pockets and small slots for hooks that do fit most ergonomic style hooks. It will fit 2-3 smaller skeins of yarn and the project, if it's not too big. Afghan? Maybe, depending on the size. Probably not going to fit a lot of yarn in addition to the afghan.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: A very nice Yarn Bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag arrived the day after being ordered as promised. I took the bag out of the plastic and unfolded it and looked inside. The construction seemed sturdy as did the fabric used to construct it. I folded it back up, put it back in the plastic and put it in a box to ship to my daughter who is in the army and in Kuwait at this time. She requested that I send her knitting supplies as she wants to knit in her down time. I'm sure she'll love it and she'll be surprised because I didn't tell her I was sending that along with the other supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Motte

customer_reviews.title: Best Thing You Can Use When Working With Yarn
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about these Yarn Storage Bags. I have 3 of them 2 are from another company but made on the same principal. I find this one to be a little more sturdy. They hold alot of yarn and are so easy to work out of, the yarn glides through and no tangles worrying about it rolling around. I highly recommend them to any knitter or crocheter you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Gaetze

customer_reviews.title: Handy medium sized project bag.
customer_reviews.text: So far I like the bag. I have two projects in the bag right now, I think a divider inside the bag would be the only improvement. I've not used the outside pockets, but they seem good. It had a bit of a plastic smell when I opened the package, but it was gone in under 24 hrs. Love the blue color and polka dots.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Shape "crumples."
customer_reviews.text: At first I would have given a 5 rating. However, after a short while, the bag did not hold a cylindrical shape. The top crumpled down & the bag fell over spilling the contents of the outside pocket. some sort of a plastic cylinder sewn between the lining & exterior would help tremendously. I am going to try to install a cylindrical frame inside. If my frame works, I will again be happy with this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Chuk

customer_reviews.title: The bag is handy and carries a lot of yarn and supplies
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the yarn bag. It's more attractive than the duffel bag I was carrying with my yarn and supplies. I like that it has a should strap for easy carrying. It hold many skeins or balls of yarn. I work with plastic canvas and I can carry extra sheets by curving them inside the bag. I do wish there were more and larger pockets on the outside. Some reviews mentioned a terrible odor. Mine came with a slight smell but a small spritz of Febreeze and a couple hours outside took that away permanently.
customer_reviews.author: MsDAB

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to knitting so it's possible I will find design fault with this bag somewhere down the line. That said, it's hard to find a good bag for any purpose at $20. This appears to be good quality. It's nicely lined and has multiple pockets inside and out. For me, it is just right for stashing my project and supplies. Very happy with product and delivery. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: A. Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great thoughtful gift for people who crochet, my fiance loved it
customer_reviews.text: My fiance loves it. She takes it everywhere with her so she can crochet her projects. She takes it to work and crochets during her breaks. And when she just wants to chill out before she goes to work she uses it as well. She likes the storage capacity of it and the fact that there are pockets for crochet needles and patterns. She also sometimes stores a bag lunch in it too LOL. She said it was a great gift and did not expect it
customer_reviews.author: MarkPB

customer_reviews.title: A great bag for knitting or crocheting.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. I am crocheting a tri-color jacket for my great granddaughter and was fed up with untangling the three yarns. I saw this bag on Amazon and I thought I would give it a try. What a difference, the yarns are held separately through the top slots, no more tangling. I have been knitting and crocheting since a child, I am now in my seventies and I have never seen such a simple idea. It also keeps the yarn clean and dogs hair free, I can even keep my work-in-progress in the bag too. The big front pocket holds my smaller tote with all the things I need on hand, hooks, scissors, row markers, etc. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: Take your crochet projects with you!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely take my crochet projects on the road because it's difficult to find something that is both big enough to hold a large project (and/or yarn for a project) and easily portable, but this fits the bill very nicely. Pockets on the outside to hold hooks and patterns or other notions, and the interior of mine is currently holding 8 wound skeins of bulky yarn plus my current project (could probably hold 10 skeins if I didn't have the project inside), with holes and slits at the top to keep the yarn inside clean and orderly while I'm crocheting.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: My bag smelled also...
customer_reviews.text: When I took the bag out of the packaging, it stunk. I let it air for probably a week and then returned to the reviews for some suggestions. Since airing made no difference, I tried the suggestion to spray it down inside and out with Febreeze - and let it hang open overnight. That did the trick. No more odor. I have not used the bag yet so no answer on the zipper issue that many have commented on. Reducing the star count because of the smell which made the bag unusable out of the packaging. Other than that, I believe the bag will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST YARN BAG EVER !
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE EVERYTHING ABOUT THIS GREAT PRODUCT. I LOVE THE COLOR , THE LARGE CAPACITY INSIDE , POCKETS TO HOLD PATTERNS, AND NEEDLES, AND THE HANDY CARRYING STRAP. ALL AROUND WONDERFUL BAG TO HOLD AND CARRY AROUND FOR ALL MY CRAFTING NEEDS. THANK YOU SO MUCH AND I WILL RECOMMEND TO MY OTHER "CRAFTY" FRIENDS. SANDY HATTON
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Hatton

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice, stands up good and keeps everything organized!
customer_reviews.text: This yarn bag is even better than I expected. The yarn stacks easily keeping everything looking nice and neat. When I am ready to put my work away I just unzip the top, lay it in and the only thing you see sticking out is a little strand of yarn. The top handle makes it easy to pick it up and move it from room to room. I probably won't use the shoulder strap because I won't be taking it when I leave the house. That has nothing to do with the bag, I just never have time to crochet when I am away from home.
customer_reviews.author: Gramarox

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Craft Bag
customer_reviews.text: Such a nice bag. I got one for my granddaughter and I was so impressed I got one for myself. This will hold a fair amount of yarn or macreme threads, embroidary tools. This is a versatile craft tool bag. Heavy construction with a handle and a shoulder strap. Well worth it, although it is reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Mema

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Sturdy, Roomy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. It stands on its own when it is empty. The top has a handle and there is an adjustable, detachable shoulder strap. The front has a roomy pocket that can hold a crochet hook case or small bag of notions. In front of that there's a pocket for scissors. There are 3 small compartments for needles/crochet hooks. The lid has 2 slits with round openings on each end so you can pull up to 4 different strands of yarn out at a time. I take this to doctors offices and it's even great to transport my work within my home. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: M.M. DeSoto

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great knitting bag for storing and carrying one big project or several small ones. There are four holes for yarn to feed through and plenty of pockets on the outside for storing needles or other items. It’s quite sturdy and of good quality. I would highly recommend this bag to any fellow knitter!
customer_reviews.author: B. Trapasso

customer_reviews.title: Not what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This bag was very disappointing to me as it does not stand up on it's own unless it is stuffed with yarn, etc. The only pockets are what you see in the picture. Guess I should have realized that I can't use the yarn holes if I already have a piece in progress. Just not what I am looking for. Fabric seem sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this bag. It’s helpful when I’m going somewhere and want to take my project along with me. It has a spacious compartment for your yarn, and the handle makes it easy to carry. The outer pockets are great for storing your hooks as well. My only complaint is that, unless you use one-pound skeins of yarn, the sides do not stay upright as your yarn weakens in strength. Overall, this is a solid buy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gaisen

customer_reviews.title: My First and Only Yarn Storage Bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. It keeps my kitten from playing with my projects as I crochet them. I would recommend this to my friends. Thank you for your prompt delivery and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Linda W

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this bag because there is a space for EVERYTHING
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this bag because there is a space for EVERYTHING. Very organized, very portable -- I work on several projects at once and this bag accommodates them all. When I have to go out and have some free time in the waiting room or wherever I am, the bag comes with and I continue working on my projects. Big time yarn master is my hobbie. And this is a perfect tool to have.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa O

customer_reviews.title: Yarn always ready
customer_reviews.text: I was really happy when I received my storage bag. I ordered it because I'm currently making a multi color blanket and wanted to keep the yarn skeins all together. Wow! This worked perfect. It is made very well, the material and size is just what I was looking for. The extra front pocket is really handy to keep your needles in, especially if your using different sizes for your project. Also, you can keep a small tape and scissors on the other side of the pocket. Very, very handy to have your project all together so you can get started...
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Daughter in law loves it
customer_reviews.text: I think my daughter in law is going to get lots of service from this! Nicely made, very interested manufacturer, they contacted me almost the minute it was delivered. I see this as a long lasting well made bag!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Storage bag for crochet
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this storage bag for my sister as a birthday gift. She loved it and so did I! In fact, I was so impressed with the durability of it that I ordered one for me! It doesn't hold as much yarn as I'd hoped, but it's great for large projects. I intend to take it on trips as well as use it at home.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Redding

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and works great for taking projects with you.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my friend who crochets and knits and who goes on road trips frequently. She loves it!! All of her yarn and tools are easily accessible and organized. The zippered top eliminates the issue of spilling you stuff during travel. Not to big to take on trips to the doctor or hospital. I am extremely pleased with the quality and functionality of this product. Wish there was something this hardy for pencils and coloring books.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected, but sturdy fabric
customer_reviews.text: A smidgeon smaller than expected, and didn't realize the sides weren't rigid until I received it and it was all folded up. Hoping that's not an issue, especially once it's filled with yarn. Otherwise, seems to be made of sturdy fabric and will work perfect for my daughter. Will post any updates if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie B

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is fantastic. I can fit so much in it. Not only was I able to put several skeins of yarn, all my hooks and other things I need for crocheting, there is still enough room to put the baby blanket I am working on in it. I love the outside pockets to keep the hook(s) I am using on my current project & also my scissors fit perfectly in the larger pocket. I would HIGHLY recommend if you don't have this already, that you get it. I am considering purchasing a second one. The price was also fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Nanci Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my things together!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It allows me to keep several skeins of yarn ready for a work in progress and I love that it keeps my current skein in place. The front pocket holds the case I keep my hooks and accessories in perfectly and I keep my "work in progress" hook in the handy front pockets too. I crochet in several places throughout my house and have found it handy to keep things together as I move around. I will be able to take it on vacation or if I know I have an appointment where I expect to have a long wait could also be taken with me with smaller projects.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Gilbertson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag while trying to get some Christmas shopping done early (before everything gets crazy in December). My sister crochets and is always carrying a tote bag of yarn and her most recent project around (hence why I bought this bag). Obviously she hasn’t recieved it yet but it looks exactly as it’s supposed to, it’s sturdy and all the zippers work. I think she’s really going to like it and I believe it’s worth the money if you or someone you know likes to bring their projects with them when they travel.
customer_reviews.author: Ercia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to grab and go!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It’s durable, the zipper glides easily, it fits 4+ skeins of yarn, it has holes in the top to keep yarn from tangling, and the storage for hooks and accessories is great! I will definitely be getting another one of these. I love that I can store a project in it, and grab it when I leave the house.
customer_reviews.author: FunnyMama

customer_reviews.title: Good size and durable
customer_reviews.text: You can not keep it from collapsing. You must fill it full of yarn or it collapses while you are trying to knit. Very durable but I can only use it for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Penny V Covington

customer_reviews.title: Larger than it looks
customer_reviews.text: This bag is so large inside. The picture doesn't do it justice.I absolutely love it. It holds so many items. I don't knit/crotchet instead I use this bag to store my movie projector, dvd player, and movie screen. The handle is sturdy and the zipper is excellent quality. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT KNITTING BAG!😍
customer_reviews.text: I love this knitting bag!😍 all the knitting bowls were to small for me. This bag is large and can fit many different colors that you can work with. I don't like my yarn on the floor when I'm knitting. I'm so glad I seen this bag and decided to try it because I love it!
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Unable to zip bag when storing project.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the concept, but I have a couple of issues. When I’m crocheting and the yarn balls up, it doesn’t go through the hole on the top of the case very easily. My second issue is that when I’m finished crocheting for a time being, and put my project in the bag, I can’t zip up the bag because of the yarn. If I’m not using the bag correctly, please let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Joni M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome portable yarn bag organizer
customer_reviews.text: The yarn bag organizer is the perfect size for the crochet yarn, the needles and some other useful tools. The blue color is very nice. The strap is great to make the bag portable and easy to carry. The zipper works great. It is super easy to feed your yarn through the top holes. There is even some extra space to have some back up yarn. I would purchase this again and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LilyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great surprise gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved her yarn storage bag, the color was perfect, the construction excellent, she can fit more than 4 skeins in it, it has a spot for the hooks, and scissor, and best of all her kitty won't be laying on top of her yarn. Oh, and it it convenient way to travel with her craft. By yhe way I got on for my daughter in law a few months ago and,she loves her's too
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Not spinning a "yarn"....
customer_reviews.text: A good purchase! I crochet often and needed something to keep my size 10 thread separate from my regular crochet yarn....this yarn storage bag is perfect! If you are working on a runner or doily, that can be stored in the bag as well. Suggestion: add another pocket on the outside of the bag :) Lightweight, portable and easy to take on the go....5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: PKL

customer_reviews.title: Yarn Storage Tote
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. You can keep plenty of yarn with you while you are on the go. I like the idea of my yarn coming out of the top and being contained and not having the ball rolling all over the floor. Great transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Great bag; horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: The bag itself is great BUT it has an extremely strong chemical smell and has given me a migraine. I only unpacked it a few hours ago I may return the bag just because the smell is so bad
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Prompt service and perfect for using 2 colors of yarn
customer_reviews.text: I have crocheted for over 50 years and this is the best Yarn Bag I have had. I chose this one because it has 2 holes on the top for my projects using 2 colors of yarn at the same time. I was pleasantly surprised at how roomy it was. They aren't kidding when they also call it a storage bag - I can use my current yarn when crocheting, and bring along more skeins with me when I travel. Prompt delivery service too!
customer_reviews.author: Linda F

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my wife. I'm really slow at getting around to write reviews. (I apologize to the seller for that...) It's worked out great for traveling or just using at home. Great yarn bag!
customer_reviews.author: Ezrway

customer_reviews.title: A very nice crafft bag
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the quality of this craft bag! I like the slits on top for the yarn. It keeps my cats under control, the little stinker! I like them pocket in the front is great for keeping my knotting/crocheting needs and yarn. It holds the books well too to keep the pattern nearby Thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: terryl White

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag because of the positive reviews others gave it. They were right: this bag is a great way to store projects and keep yarns separated when working with multiple skeins of yarn. Before I got this bag I had yarn and supplies all over the place, now everyhing is neatly stored away. Note: there was no plastic or chemical smell when I opened the bag for the first time. This bag is well made, too.
customer_reviews.author: Abg

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Mothers day gift as my mom is a bit of a disorganized knitter. Have it to her today, she loved it! It was much bigger than I expected, and appeared to be of good quality. Will fit all the yarn she'll need for her current projects. She was excited to fill it up and take to her knitting group tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Erin P

customer_reviews.title: easy to carry either over the shoulder or without shoulder ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality material, easy to carry either over the shoulder or without shoulder strap. Lover the color and the extra pockets are convenient to carry pattern info. The bag holds a lot of my blanket pattern, (super chunky yarn as well with round needles). Easy to pull the yarn through the top of the carrier to continue knitting. The bag folds easily for storage. I would recommend to all my "fellow" knitters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It holds my yarn for any project that does not take too much yarn.
customer_reviews.text: It is tall enough to hold the full size, even jumbo, skeins of yarn and leave room on top for my tool case! works very well and I am very happy with this purchase. Pockets on the outside work well for scissors and hooks. Even my patterns fit!
customer_reviews.author: Cintris

customer_reviews.title: BeCraftee Best Yarn Bag/Knitting Bag
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. I bought it for my wife as a gift and she loves it. Is does go flat when empty so it would have been nice if it had a plastic lining, but it's a great bag.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Semeraro

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room easy to carry (over the shoulder or by the handle)
customer_reviews.text: I had to travel mid December and was working on a gift, I had been crocheting. This Knitting Bag was perfect, I used it as my carry-on. There was room for 3 balls of yarn, my purse (use have a purse measures 8"x 5" x 3") pulse my quart bag of liquids per TSA regulations. I LOVED it.
customer_reviews.author: wendybird

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: So happy to have a place to keep my yarn as I work. I am not using the to feeds currently because I had already started the project. My only reason for giving a four star as opposed to five star is because I wish it stood upright better. It tends to flop sideways. Otherwise, I love this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Hetu

customer_reviews.title: Great for complicated projects
customer_reviews.text: I am currently working on a project that has seven different balls of yarn in use at one time. The bag has enough tension on the slits where the yarn passes through to reduce tangling but the yarn does flow though without requiring an undue amount of pulling. It has met the needs for which it was purchased. The pockets are good although it would be nice if it had at least one zipped pocket on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could use a slight improvement
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to receive my yarn caddy promptly. I like the size so I can keep a couple of skeins of yarn and my project in the bag where I can just pick it up and go. The only drawback I see is that it is not ridgid. I would improve that with a plastic inner lining to keep its shape. I will probably fabricate something myself to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Louise B.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a bag like this to keep my knitting stuff in while working on projects and so I could take them with me and work on them no matter were I was. The way they designed the top so the yarn comes out easy but you don't have to worry about the yarn ball coming out of the bag and rolling on a dirty floor was genuis. My only issue is that they need to have more color variety. Not only women knit. I'm a 6'2 300lb black guy and carrying around a frilly bag makes me look even crazier than i am. But the blue one will do great for my first bag
customer_reviews.author: DYMETRL

customer_reviews.title: Good item to have!
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I purchased this product, because it is spacious enough to keep a lot of items in this/one bag. The only thing that needs improvement is the inside layer; otherwise, the material which was used for the external part of the bag seems durable/practical.
customer_reviews.author: Ned18

customer_reviews.title: Not too big, not too small!
customer_reviews.text: It’s so cute! I was afraid it was gonna be way too big or awkwardly small but honestly it’s perfect. I just started getting into Crochet and I didn’t want my yarn destroyed so I got this guy and it’s PERFECT! What’s even better is it’ll be SO good for my sewing stuff for when I travel WITH my crochet stuff to keep me occupied when I have downtime.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Jones

customer_reviews.title: A must for any yarn work
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS. The yarn comes out through the slot without a problem, it cleans up well, has plenty of room for differnt yarn. You can have more than one color come out through the slots. The pockets in the front are a nice added feature, although there isn’t any way to snap or zip shut. Was very happy I got this.
customer_reviews.author: Irish Freckled Songbird

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for all your yarn craft needs! I purchased this as a gift for a fellow crochet enthusiast and will be purchasing another for myself. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Very nice organizing my Yarn
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Just what I was looking for to store the yarn and have it feed without getting all tangled or my cat finds it and runs away with the whole bag of yarn!! Formerly was using just a plastic bag while I crocheted, constantly having to grab it back from my cat when she found the loose end. The new storage bag totally protects the loose end which you can tuck back inside the opening, to prevent my afghan from becoming a huge mess, cat toy!!! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag!!
customer_reviews.text: After getting my yarn bag in the mail, I feel in love with the amount of space that it has! I'm so happy that I finally have something to carry my yarn in whenever I travel to either my parents house or while sitting in my car when I go pick up my son from school. And I got it as an early birthday gift to myself! I use Lion Brand Mandala yarn and I love that it can hold of to three skeins!
customer_reviews.author: Cissy

customer_reviews.title: Cuteand handy!
customer_reviews.text: i got this as a gift for a good friend who likes to knit and is going on a boat trip to Alaska. i think this will keep things neat and organized for her and she likes denim.It seemed to be well made. i was pleased to find it for her!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile, stationary yet on the go when need be.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little bag. It keeps all of my yarn and wips off of my table and away from my cat. Plus If and when we travel I now have a travel yarn bag and not a grocery bag. Should just call it best yarn bag not specify it for knitting as there's crocheters too 😉 but hey overall I love this bag. Keeps my wips in one place and out of the way and on the go when need be.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisnDiana

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected.... haven't been able ...
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than expected....haven't been able to use it yet since I'm airing it out due to the smell on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: jaycee

customer_reviews.title: Great yarn bag!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my wife, who always has balls of yarn rolling all over the living room! She loves the size, portability, and material, as well as the holes in the tops of the storage bag. We have a dog shed a lot, so the idea that it can stay closed and still be used is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Claire Mostel

customer_reviews.title: Best bag ever
customer_reviews.text: I love it the space is great lots of pockets to store items in the depth is perfect in the ease-of-use is wonderful thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Great storage. Good size. Perfect for traveling.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size to traveling with. Plenty of space and pockets to hold several skeins of yarn and other crochet supplies. I like that there are hole on the top of the lid so you can use your yarn without taking it out of the bag. I like the color and polka dots on the inside. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Great Features!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really roomy bag that holds my current project and all the skeins I haven't started on yet (6). I love the pockets on the outside for pens or crochet hooks and the slits on top that the yarn comes through work well with the Homespun I am using right now.
customer_reviews.author: SalemPoe

customer_reviews.title: Product met my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my yarn bag. I wanted something to keep my yarn clean as I often travel with my projects and also to organize the yarn. I especially like that you can have 4 different colors started and ready to go at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Love this WIP bag!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful bag for whatever crochet project I happen to be working on. Slots in top allows yarn strands out while working but snug enough to keep the kitty from dragging out. Also keeps project and yarn hair/dust/dirt free. It holds several skeins of yarn at one time plus has room in outside pockets for patterns, hooks (or needles), etc. Not only great for storing project & yarn but makes travelling with it easy peasy thanks to the carrying handle on top or the the shoulder strap that clips on . Love this bag! I may just have to order a few more as I usually have several works in progress at any given time. Great customer service too!! :)
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: I loved it so much I ordered another one
customer_reviews.text: I loved it so much I bought a second one in the other color (red) For my neighbor as a Christmas present
customer_reviews.author: Whitney A. Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Great for All Crafts
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, extremely portable yarn bag - I purchased one a few months back that I use for other crafts and when my daughter started knitting again, I purchased one for her. She also loves hers - there's lots of storage and the bag itself is pretty nice to look at so you can work on your crafts/knitting etc. anywhere and this bag will not likely clash with your decor.
customer_reviews.author: B. Alfred

customer_reviews.title: Love this beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love this beautiful, sturdy bag. I like how it's tall and deep with plenty of room left over for my crafting stuff. I bought it to store my latch hook kit yarn, canvas, and hook, so I don't need the holes at the top that knitters can use to pull yarn through as they knit. But, if I take up knitting. it's good to know it's there.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Dearest

customer_reviews.title: Crafty wife LOVES this product!
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a big-time crafter and crochet-er, and she absolutely loved this storage basket. It's sturdy and durable, and holds plenty of large skeins of chunky yarn inside the compartment. Plenty of places for hook and needle storage as well.
customer_reviews.author: Camron

customer_reviews.title: Right for organizing and keeping it neat.
customer_reviews.text: I've been making a Afghan for my granddaughters in this really helps when I bark travel or stay at all.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Rebman

customer_reviews.title: Just About Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I drag this around with me just about everywhere. Holds several balls of yarn and my hooks. Only (very minor) complaint I have is the three pockets on the outside for holding a pen or a hook are too skinny to be much use. Would have been great if they were wide enough to hold my yarn snippers or a larger crochet hook. Otherwise, I love this.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Great little yarn bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the BeCraftee Yarn bag and very pleased with the capacity to hold yarn , scissors, crochet hooks and other knitting needles. It’s a perfect size and is very handy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Great storage bag
customer_reviews.text: One of the best organizational crafting items I have ever bought, nice and roomy, super convenient to feed different yarn colors through the holes in the top to keep them from rolling around and getting tangled, plus it is great for keeping yarn away from any feisty cats trying to play while you work!
customer_reviews.author: FamilRa

customer_reviews.title: A Great Way to store your yarn
customer_reviews.text: I love this Yarn Bag. It has a zipper and outside pockets for needles and accessories. I store 6 skeins of yarn inside. The holes in the top protect my yarn from my "helper" cats. They used to tear up my yarn skeins that I had out working on a project. This is a great bag for traveling anywhere. There's plenty of room for everything. I keep this by my big chair and it's not in the way. A Great price and a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Pinky Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag! It is roomy enough to hold enough yarn for a huge project. (Large blanket, Paul Bunyan sweater?) the top of the bag has 4 guide holes for yarn. Great if you are working 4 colors on your project. The bag is well made and a great addition to any knitter's life.
customer_reviews.author: L-Star

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes 100%
customer_reviews.text: These are always great. My mom got me one and I gifted one. They are just amazing. Deff get it if you crochet on the go. Or at home. Or in the tub. Or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey k

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: This storage bag is awesome!!! I needed something that I could keep the yarn of a current project in without getting dust and pet hair all over it. It is made from a very durable material and is lightweight. I don't put anymore than 6 skeins of yarn in it as I don't want to fill it to the max. Definitely a great purchase for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect bag for projects. It will hold 3 one pounder skeins of yard and all my hooks, scissors, stitch markers, and any printed instructions as well. The openings at the top allow for neat dispensing of the yarn. Now, if I can just keep the cats from thinking it's their personal yarn play toy I'll be good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great handy way to carry projects
customer_reviews.text: Great item so roomy and nicely put together fits all the yarn for my projects and my looms. Love the strap that makes it easy to carry everything I am working with so happy I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine in Largo, FL

customer_reviews.title: Quality and price. Acceptable.
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice size with usable pockets and compartments however I expected it to be of a softer material to accommodate traveling especially when on a plane. But then again because of the stiffness it probably will keep the contents safer. I like it and plan to use it when I travel to keep everything I need in order.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Graham

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful storage bag!
customer_reviews.text: This yarn storage bag is really very nicely made. It has a substantial feel to the case. Its a quality product, not cheaply made. The inside is lined and smooth, there's absolutely no chemical smell to the case. I am very impressed with the quality. I've seen what the local craft stores have. This bag surpasses the flimsy ones that the local stores stock. I am very happy with my purchase! I will definitely order from this seller again for my future supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have with the matching crochet kit!
customer_reviews.text: I love my bag and the matching crochet kit that I bought with it! It holds so much yarn and it also comes with the detachable travel strap, which is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: twilightangel04

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling or home!
customer_reviews.text: I love my bag. It holds all yarn needed for a project and has pockets for my scissors, needles and markers. The yarn holes on top work perfectly. Very sturdy and good looking too.
customer_reviews.author: GARRY NOLTING

customer_reviews.title: Great for knitting/crocheting on the go.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it's a gift for my mom who belongs to three different groups of knitters and crocheting. And she no longer has to drag skeins of yarn out to access projects. Most importantly when she gets ready to start chemo in a few weeks she'll be able to bring this along and help keep her mind off of what's being done.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jean Thompson

customer_reviews.title: The sack that has it all
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It's got a nice tight lol front pocket, hook pockets, and lovely slits to slide your yarn thru so if u set it up just right, you can move your whole big complicated project in one swift movement now. Which is what I needed cause my yarn tails were trapping me on the couch. :) my friends call it the Yarn Trashcan. I don't mind tho it does a hell of a job and if I ever get the free time to re-furbish it I might change the look to some Zelda fabric I got lying around. Overall thrilled! Thanks again guys
customer_reviews.author: Bobbly

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to store one or two different projects handy over the arm carrier easy to take with you on the go
customer_reviews.author: ~Sandra~

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom as a Christmas present and she loves it. There is plenty of room for her yarn as well as knitting and crochet needles. It’s very portable; light and easy to carry even when full. The design of it keeps the yarn safe from our cats which was an added bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: I love it I would buy another one it is nice ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it I would buy another one it is nice and big it holds a lot it is very durable and sturdy and I love the shoulder strap and lots of pockets. For my little gadgets. Also came fast before due date.
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIE

customer_reviews.title: Nice to keep yarn
customer_reviews.text: I like that it keeps all of the yarn nicely. The only problem I seem to have is the yarn gets tangled when I put my project in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: zena m parkman

product_meta.title: BeCraftee Best Yarn Bag/Knitting Bag. Portable, Light and Easy to Carry. Yarn Storage Bags Have Pockets for Crochet Hooks & Knitting Needles. Slits on Top to Protect Wool and Prevent Tangling.
feature_bullets: ❤️KNITTING & CROCHET PROJECTS ON THE GO- A convenient crochet bag to take wherever you go. Storage for your sewing kit and knitting supplies at home. Comes with a handle or detachable shoulder strap. The perfect organizer bag for travel.

❤️ORGANIZED & CLUTTER-FREE PROJECTS- Yarn Caddy for crochet supplies made of superior quality linen. Lined with cotton and double stitched so it will last and keeps it shape without slumping. No nasty chemicals so your yarn won't smell.

❤️MULTIPLE PROJECTS ON THE GO! With a diameter of 10.3" and 11.8’ tall, our yarn bowl can store at least 10 skeins of knitting yarn. Ideal for larger projects that need many balls of wool and knitting accessories.

❤️TANGLE-FREE YARN - Crochet organizer tote has 4 slits on top to prevent wool from.Allows yarn to be pulled at perfect tension. Slits are stiff enough so yarn won't pull out and pets can't get in! The crochet tote bag has 5 outside pockets and 2 on the inside to hold crochet needles, crochet hook, and any tool for crochet.
❤️BUY WITH CONFIDENCE - We stand behind our yarn bag’s quality. Your satisfaction is our priority. If there is an issue with your bag, contact us and we'll make it right for you.
